definition: Three Gorges Reservoir on the Changjiang or Yangtze
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Reservoir bank collapse is an import geological problem which should have an effect on Three Gorges Reservoir Project.
sentences.chinese: 水库塌岸是影响三峡水库工程成败的重大地质问题。

sentences.english: After the construction of the reservoir in the Three—gorge is completed, the Epigraph will be submerged eternally.
sentences.chinese: 三峡水库建成后，整个白鹤梁题刻将会淹没于水中。

sentences.english: Based on experimental analysis of the Three-Gorges reservoir, total phosphorus content was predicted.
sentences.chinese: 并根据试验分析预测三峡水库消落带总磷含量。

sentences.english: Three Gorges Dam discharge may only last 15 days.
sentences.chinese: 三峡水库蓄水量只能维持15天用水。

sentences.english: Reservoir bank collapse is one of the most severe geological disasters.
sentences.chinese: 水库塌岸是影响三峡水库的重大地质灾害问题。

sentences.english: This result is helpful for predicting the effect of reservoir impounding of Three Gorges Project on downstream reaches.
sentences.chinese: 并预测三峡水库蓄水后下游年沙量将进一步减少。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges reservoir is also filling with sewage.
sentences.chinese: 生活污水也被排入三峡水库。

sentences.english: Many market town wharfs will be rebuilt with the progress of Three Gorges Reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 随着三峡水库的修建，库区的集镇码头将大量复建。

definition: Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
period of low water level (winter in north China)

Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
